title: Two-Bedroom Home on the 1st Floor! Available in August!
neighborhood: 1129 S Eaton Cir, Castle Rock, CO 80104
map_address: 1129 S Eaton Cir near Plum Creek Parkway
posting_body: Welcome to Vistas at Plum Creek Apartments
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 970 Sq.
Welcome to Vistas at Plum Creek, where you will be eager to settle into our one- and two-bedroom Castle Rock apartments situated in a stunning location.

Situated amongst the breathtaking mountain vistas, our apartments in Castle Rock, CO come in five different flexible floor plan options, complete with vinyl plank flooring, plush carpeting, and a warm fireplace for the coziest nights in.
Our spacious kitchens are fitted out with modern appliances and plenty of storage space for every kind of cook.
Skylights and balconies allow you to bask in the natural beauty of the surrounding area without ever having to leave your home.

Beautiful Renovated Apartment Homes, Kitchen Pantry*, Wood Burning Fireplace, Vaulted Ceiling & Skylights*, Central Heat & Air Conditioning, Ceiling Fans*, Private Patio or Balcony*, 9-Foot Ceilings, Plank-Style Wood Flooring*, In-Home Washer & Dryer, Beautiful Kitchen with Full Modern Appliance Package

Pet-Friendly Community with Bark Park, Sparkling Swimming Pool, Resident Clubhouse with TV Lounge & Complimentary Wi-Fi, 24-Hour Fitness Center with Free Weights, Beautiful Courtyard with Community BBQ Grills, On-Site Management with Courtesy Package Acceptance, & 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance, Valet Waste Doorstep Rubbish Collection Service, Onsite Guest Suite Available
We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!
We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.
Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some age, weight and breed restrictions apply.
